roleset.name: give

example.name: unstated thing given
example.text: Pamela Sebastian in New York contributed to this article.

example.name: unstated benefactor
example.text: Last year they contributed #34 million, before taxes.
example.note: The "before taxes" is misparsed--it should be part of the NP with #34 -->--million.

example.name: topicalized
example.text: Also contributing to the firmness in copper was *trace* a report by Chicago purchasing agents.
example.arg: a report by Chicago purchasing agents.

roleset.note: Frames file for 'contribute' based on big corpus, comparison with 'give'; adjectival 'contributive' based on BOLT-7. Member of Vncls contribute-13.2-1-1-1.

example.name: adjectival rel: contributive
example.text: Cancelling the policy by which a home buyer may be granted with a local hukou is an effective and cost - effective means to effectively curb the real estate speculators and effectively bring down the housing prices which still remains high ; in addition , it is also contributive to promoting the development of small towns and more balanced development of various undertakings in the people 's livelihood , especially the development of the countryside .
example.arg: to promoting the development of small towns and more balanced development of various undertakings in the people 's livelihood , especially the development of the countryside
